name: The Watcher and the Keeper
description:
A casual game made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Another harvest season is comming. Your job is to store the mature crops. But some little monsters also covet these sweet fruits. Maybe you should protect your properties, or maybe you should be generous. It's up to you!

Control MoveW  A  S  DInteract / Pick up / Put downE
Use weaponLeft Mouse Button
